item.content:encoded:
Price: $22.98
(as of Nov 30,2022 10:26:48 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Let’s protect your home and help dogs have more fun!

Dogs are known to be terrible chewers when they feel alone and grow teeth. Now, our family chew toys can protect your shoes, clothes, and even your furniture!

KILL ALL NEGATIVITY TO BUILD MORE POSITIVE ENERGY ALL DAY !

4 x Rubber Dog Chew Toy

Made of natural rubber, it is more flexible, durable and safe for your dog to chew and clean his teeth. Allow your dog to breathe better and have a healthier mouth. The cute design makes it easier for your dog to grasp. Puppy chew toy has small dimples that can really soothe your puppy’s gums. Brightly colored dog chew toys are easy to use and can satisfy your dog’s natural urge to chew.

10 x Rope Dog Toy

Tightly hand-woven cotton rope toys for tug-of-war and catch games. With a large selection of rope toys, you can easily replace damaged toys and actually have a longer life span. Your pup will have fun playing with them while keeping them off your shoes or furniture.

1 IQ dog funnel ball and 2 loofah tooth cleaning dog toys

Made of hard plastic, these snack dispensing balls are durable and suitable for dogs to chew. The surface has a regular texture so it won’t roll too far and your dog can easily grab it. Also, your dog will love tossing and rolling the ball to remove treats when they hear the cute squeaking sound.

Perfect Gift for Puppies

20 Pcs valued puppy chew toys great size for teething puppies. An Idea Choice for Your Puppies!

Product Dimensions ‚Äè : ‚Äé 9 x 7.8 x 3.93 inches; 2.4 Pounds
Date First Available ‚Äè : ‚Äé September 30, 2021
Manufacturer ‚Äè : ‚Äé qinhe
ASIN ‚Äè : ‚Äé B09HJR2GBB

„ÄêSmall Puppy Toys For Furniture Protection„Äë: Are you worried about your puppy chewing on the sofa, shoes, boredom, loneliness and releasing energy while teething? ‚ÄãOur toys are designed for puppy teething to help change your puppy’s bad chewing behavior, stop worrying, and keep your furniture safe. These puppy chew toys for teething not only clean the incisors, but also help clean the plaque hidden in dead spots, removing plaque and preventing cavities. Keep your puppy’s teeth healthy!
„ÄêInteractive Training Small Dog Toys„Äë: The snack ball is a great teething toy for dogs, and it can improve their IQ as they learn to toss and roll it for snacks. When dogs receive a healthy balance of physical and mental stimulation, they feel happy and well-adjusted. A variety of rope toys are perfect for tug-of-war, tossing and fetch games that promote relationships while interacting with your pet. Buy our puppy chew toys and make your dog smarter and happier!
„ÄêSafe And Tight Puppy Teething Chew Toys„Äë: The dog rope toy is made of 100% natural washable cotton, non-toxic and odorless, so your pet can chew and play safely. Our cotton rope dog toys are thin, but tough and durable. The wisdom balls and dog bones are also very chewy. If your dog is an aggressive chewer, then these puppy toys are not indestructible. They should only be played with under supervision. Dog toys bulk also keep the toys fresh in your dog’s mind
„ÄêQuality Gifts And Service„Äë: This puppy teething toy set is a great gift for friends who have puppies. It is also a great gift for your little family member. From fun indoor activities to outdoor play with your dog, just one set of puppy chew toys is enough to give your dog more fun and exercise in his daily life! If you have any questions about our products, please feel free to contact us, we are always ready to help you solve your problems!


Let’s protect your home and help dogs have more fun!

Dogs are known to be terrible chewers when they feel alone and grow teeth. Now, our family chew toys can protect your shoes, clothes, and even your furniture!


KILL ALL NEGATIVITY TO BUILD MORE POSITIVE ENERGY ALL DAY !




4 x Rubber Dog Chew Toy

  • Made of natural rubber, it is more flexible, durable and safe for your dog to chew and clean his teeth. Allow your dog to breathe better and have a healthier mouth. The cute design makes it easier for your dog to grasp. Puppy chew toy has small dimples that can really soothe your puppy’s gums. Brightly colored dog chew toys are easy to use and can satisfy your dog’s natural urge to chew.

10 x Rope Dog Toy

  • Tightly hand-woven cotton rope toys for tug-of-war and catch games. With a large selection of rope toys, you can easily replace damaged toys and actually have a longer life span. Your pup will have fun playing with them while keeping them off your shoes or furniture.

1 IQ dog funnel ball and 2 loofah tooth cleaning dog toys

  • Made of hard plastic, these snack dispensing balls are durable and suitable for dogs to chew. The surface has a regular texture so it won’t roll too far and your dog can easily grab it. Also, your dog will love tossing and rolling the ball to remove treats when they hear the cute squeaking sound.

item.description: Price: (as of – Details) Give Your Dog an Active Play Outlet with a Soft Crinkle Paper Dog Toy from Best Pet Supplies We all want to give our dogs a healthy way to play, have fun, and enjoy staying active; especially when it comes to giving them toys that are less messy and stand ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $5.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:20:14 UTC – Details)


Give Your Dog an Active Play Outlet with a Soft Crinkle Paper Dog Toy from Best Pet Supplies We all want to give our dogs a healthy way to play, have fun, and enjoy staying active; especially when it comes to giving them toys that are less messy and stand up to all the biting, chewing, and tugging. That‚Äôs why we created these super cute, high-quality Best Pet Supplies Duck-Shaped Dog Toys with built-in squeaker and crinkle paper. These versatile toys for dogs give them multiple ways to play and stay engaged while satisfying their natural behavioral needs. And because there‚Äôs no stuffing you don‚Äôt have to worry about cleaning up a big mess the moment your dog rips into them. Product Details: Soft Duck Dog Toy Built-In Squeezable Squeaker Crinkle Paper Interior No Stuffing or Fluff Available in 6 Fun Colors Overall Length: 15‚Äù
Product Dimensions ‚Äè : ‚Äé 15.5 x 7.5 x 1.5 inches; 0.63 Ounces
Item model number ‚Äè : ‚Äé PT332
Date First Available ‚Äè : ‚Äé July 27, 2021
Manufacturer ‚Äè : ‚Äé Best Pet Supplies, LLC
ASIN ‚Äè : ‚Äé B09BBM5CX8
Country of Origin ‚Äè : ‚Äé China

Cute and Colorful Duck Shape – Shaped like a real duck these dog crinkle toys for small dogs, medium dogs, and every size in between comes in 6 unique colors and provides a more puppy friendly shape that’s easy to carry around
No Fluff, No Mess Design – Unlike messy bones, ropes, or other toys for aggressive chewers these dog crinkle toys won’t leave behind a mess after they’re done playing. They also boast reinforced fabric and stitching to help them hold up to chewing
Active Play, Tossing, and Retrieving – Our cute duck chew toys for dogs can be used for bonding with your puppy, reducing stress or separation anxiety, or simply giving them an active outlet for channeling aggression or intense play


Read more





Cleaning Made Easy

Need to get that toy cleaned from drools or dirt? Just toss it into the washing machine on gentle cycle and tumble dry on low heat.

Soft, Plush, and Durable

We use higher-quality materials in our dog toys to ensure they hold up to regular chewing, biting, tugging, and pulling. If the squeaker or the paper comes out simply discard them and you can continue to let your dog play with the duck for as long as it‚Äôs still chewable.

Audible Play Sounds

The crinkle paper in the body and the squeaker in the head give dogs multiple outlets for stimulating their auditory and physical senses. These distinct sounds will keep them having fun far longer than standard toys, so they can relieve stress, stay focused, and even reduce aggressive behaviors.

Adorable Variety

At 15‚Äù in size these colorful ducks are more fun for young puppies and older dogs alike because they feature multiple ‚Äúchew points‚Äù and they‚Äôre a better shape for carrying.

Read more



4.5
Price: $5.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:20:14 UTC – Details)

(as of Nov 30,2022 04:32:03 UTC – Details)

Product Description

For dogs and other pets, toys are not a luxury, but a necessity.

Toys aren’t a luxury when it comes to your dog. They’re an absolute necessity. They not only prevent boredom and the negative behaviors that can arise when dogs are bored, they also stimulate their brains and trigger dogs’ natural play drive.

1. Active toys: The interactive dog biting toys can be applied for training your dog’s biting skills, helping them correct the destructive bitting habits, guide a correct chewing habits. Protecting shoes, socks, sheets, sofas not being destroyed! It is also a puzzle toy for dog grow.

2. Comfort toys: When a dog is teething, its gums will be itchy and ache, which is very painful. The pea shaped chew toys through let the dog bites something to relieve the pain of teething.

3. Distraction toys: Toys are important to your dog‚Äôs well-being. Toys help fight boredom when you have to leave your dog at home, and provide comfort when they‚Äôre feeling nervous. Toys can even help prevent your dog from developing certain problem behavior

Soft without hurting teeth

The Hurray rubber toy is very soft and can even be bent 90 degrees without breaking, fully protecting the dog’s teeth.

Clean teeth in all directions

When a dog is teething, its gums will be itchy and ache, which is very painful. The pea shaped chew toys through let the dog bites something to relieve the pain of teething.

It adopts 360-degree full-enclosed molar protruding points, a total of 578 protruding points.

Nature Rubber & Non-toxic

The Hurray pea shape dog chew toys are made of natural rubber, It’s very durable non-toxic. And the size are suitable for small or medium dog.

Product Description

Great for interactive indoor and outdoor play.

HIGH DENSITY RING DOG TOY

with sufficient toughness was born to chew

Built for long-lasting engagement and promotes your dog’s strong jaws. discouraging destructive chewing, combat boredom and relieve anxiety or frustration. Soft and bouncy material keeps it never hurt puppy’s mouth or teeth when chewing.

Help your dog spend his boundless reserves of energy with the ring dog chew toy. This long-lasting chew toy will provide hours of playtime for you and your furry friend.

WHY DOGS NEED IT?

THICK RIM STANDS UP TO TOUGH CHEWING LAYERED TEXTURES BUILT FOR LONG-LASTING ENGAGEMENT AND ENTERTAINED FOR HOURS NUBS DESIGN TO REDUCE PLAQUE AND TARTAR HELP SATISFY DOG’S INSTINCTUAL NEEDS AND PROVIDES MENTAL STIMULATION.

All-STAR OF DOG TOYS VALUE SET OF 14!

Puppies explore the world by chewing, various types available for 2-3 toys timely change, that’s help puppies to stay curious, develop intelligence. JUST BUY ONE, get the combination of dog teething toys, chew toys, rope toys and interactive toys, every part of our dog toy pack is necessary, cooperate to keep dog happy chewing. The most valuable team works better for the dog‚Äôs healthy growth.

JUST CLICK IT, you can get all you need here.

Chewing is a great way for dogs to communicate, encourage it without being destructive helps to keep dog‚Äôs right chewing behavior from an early age. Rubber ring toy has a long-lasting, high bouncy, by chewing it, satisfy dogs’ instincts and relief the stress caused by boredom or anxiety. Want to extend playtime? Be sure to entice with a dash of peanut butter in the grooves.

4 adorable chew toys are specially designed for teething puppies and small dogs, including one heart-shaped toy, one star-shaped toy, one key-like toy and one biscuit-like toy, Teething puppies have strong chewing desire out of the pain from gum soreness, inflammation and teeth shooting. Chewing our soft and flexible rubber toys will help massage gums and relieve stress, which is good for teething in return.

Cotton rope dog toys are classical type, great for tug of war games. Your doggie will have a fun time while keeping your home tidy and clean. Also act as teeth floss, deeply clean the hidden germs.

High bouncy dog ball toy is great dog training toys, benefit your furry friends. They running, jumping to get the toys, that training dogs‚Äô reaction and leaping ability, positively enhance the relationship between you and your dogs.

2 plush dog squeaky toys feature a inner squeaker, not too loud but still get the dog‚Äôs attention.

From the brand

Who are we?

We‚Äôre a small family-run business that includes 15 humans, 5 dogs, and 4 cats.

What makes our products unique?

Our cleaning products are safe and effective. Our treats are made in small batches with real ingredients. We‚Äôre pet-friendly and people-happy.

Why do we love what we do?

We love dog people and cat people as much as we love dogs and cats, and keeping pet-loving homes happy makes our day!

Learn More About Rocco & Roxie

Is Discontinued By Manufacturer ‚Äè : ‚Äé No
Product Dimensions ‚Äè : ‚Äé 2 x 2 x 7.5 inches; 9.59 Ounces
Manufacturer recommended age ‚Äè : ‚Äé 0 months and up
Item model number ‚Äè : ‚Äé No-Chew-8-oz-B
Date First Available ‚Äè : ‚Äé March 1, 2017
Manufacturer ‚Äè : ‚Äé Rocco & Roxie Supply Co.
ASIN ‚Äè : ‚Äé B06XCZ8KJJ
Country of Origin ‚Äè : ‚Äé USA

TWICE AS BITTER The super bitter taste pets hate, thanks to our double-strength extreme bitter formulation. LONG-LASTING ALCOHOL-FREE FORMULA Works longer than alcohol-based formulas which evaporate as the alcohol dries.
WITH CALMING COPAIBA OIL FOR SOOTHING HOT SPOTS Spraying on rough, tender skin? Stop the aggravating behavior‚ÄîAND help soothe and heal hot spots thanks to tea tree essential oil.
SAFE ON FURNITURE‚ÄîGOOD FOR SKIN Use as often as needed! Kind to all sorts of fabric, fur and furniture‚Äî including drapes, shoes, electrical cords as well as paws, tails and pet‚Äôs itchy skin.
PROFESSIONALLY FORMULATED! 100% GUARANTEED And as always, we stand behind our products 100%. We earn your five-star reviews by making high-quality products that work.

Product description

Our No Chew Extreme Bitter Spray is formulated to be twice as bitter. Because when it comes to discouraging your furry friends from chewing, licking or destroying things around your house why mess around? The more bitter the better! In addition, it contains calming copaiba oil, an essential oil known for its abilities to soothe inflamed skin and hot spots. So not only does our spray deter pets from gnawing away on fur, bandages, and wounds, it helps in the healing process. Safe on furniture. Soothing on pet skin. Of course, like all Rocco & Roxie products, you won‚Äôt find ‚Äúbaddies‚Äù like harmful alcohol or stinging chemicals in this formula. You can spray No Chew right on pets‚Äô skin‚Äîor over the topical medicines you‚Äôve applied. It keeps on working even as it dries, unlike alcohol-base products whose power diminishes as the alcohol evaporates.

EFFECTIVELY DISCOURAGES CHEWING

The super bitter taste pets hate, thanks to our double-strength extreme bitter formulation. LONG-LASTING ALCOHOL-FREE FORMULA Works longer than alcohol-based formulas which evaporate as the alcohol dries.

WITH CALMING COPAIBA OIL

WITH CALMING COPAIBA OIL FOR SOOTHING HOT SPOTS Spraying on rough, tender skin? Stop the aggravating behavior‚ÄîAND help soothe and heal hot spots thanks to tea tree essential oil.

SAFE ON FURNITURE
